==Blind Man Challenge==
===Format===
One player from each team is blindfolded, and must control their character using directions provided by their team member. Timed matches were used. Sudden Death was played.

==Around the World==
===Format===
Each player starts by placing their token on a character in the corner of the Character Select Screen. At the end of each match, the winner advances their token to the next adjacent character. The goal of the game is to win a match with every character on the Character Select Screen.

All stages were enabled, and stages were randomly selected. Game rules were Free For All, two minutes, two stocks. Sudden Death was played.
